description.en: Ankaa Exchange operates as a decentralized exchange, offering perpetual trading options with incredibly low swap fees and zero price impact trades. Its innovative multi-asset pool enables liquidity providers to earn fees from market making, swap fees, and high leverage trading, making it a uniquely attractive option in the world of cryptocurrency trading.
